name: Switchboard
headline: Technology for Trucking
description: Switchboard uses real-time data obtained by Switchboard devices installed on commercial vehicles to provide visibility and reporting on freight location, routing availability, and other related data important to manage freight movement across North America.

# Technology for commercial transportation
Switchboard streamlines your operations with technology that gets you on the road
[Book a Demo](https://www.onswitchboard.com/</sign-up>)[Learn More](https://www.onswitchboard.com/<https:/www.onswitchboard.com/solution/hours-of-service-eld>)
## SWITCHBOARD IS Trusted by fleets across North America
![T&P Trucking company logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5c8f530815840c739c2_TP-Logo.webp)

](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5c599c50dfb651964ac_DmExpressLogo.webp)
![Centurion Trucking Logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5c55528a6162a559c81_Centurion-Logo.webp)
## Compliance shouldn't be complicated
Save time on training and troubleshooting hours-of-service with easy to use compliance technology for you and your drivers.
Switchboard gets you compliant with the DOT & NSC in minutes, not weeks.
Our team provides 24/7 access in multiple languages.
[Talk to us](https://www.onswitchboard.com/</sign-up>)
![Switchboard ELD Logs tablet screenshot
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5ce99c50dfb65196e65_Tablet-and-Logs.webp)
![Switchboard Map & Driver analytics screenshots
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5cecf5cb1781eda5366_Driver-Analytics.webp)
## Empower your decisions with insights
Get real time reports on drivers’ safety behaviour, HOS violations, routing, and more.‍Switchboard lets you focus your coaching and decisions on the right areas.
Driver analytics and HOS violation reports
GPS tracking and Geofence notifications
[Learn More](https://www.onswitchboard.com/<https:/www.onswitchboard.com/solution/fleet-management>)
## Unlock time and money saving features
Switchboard has solutions that support all types of transportation, from asset tracking to dashcams.
Temperature monitored trailer/asset tracking
Weigh station bypass built in
Integrated dashcam video & recordings
[Learn More](https://www.onswitchboard.com/<https:/www.onswitchboard.com/solution/fleet-management>)
![Additional features offered by Switchboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5cf1af4daf438822701_Add-On-Features-1-1536x896.webp)
## Transform your fleet with Switchboard
See the Switchboard ELD and fleet management platform in action.
[Get Started](https://www.onswitchboard.com/</sign-up>)
## What our customers say about Switchboard
![Rai Express Lines logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5c6c1d1e31fa11092dc_Rai-Express-Lines-Ltd.png)
>  _Every interaction I have had with Switchboard in my capacity as Safety and Compliance Manager at Rai Express lines Ltd. has been 100% satisfactory. Great customer service by Accounts department plus support team is knowledgeable and swift in reaching to drivers who need assistance with ELD devices._
_Jack Bal_
 _Rai Express Lines Ltd._
![Charn Trucking Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6594998c9cc77895840aecb4_charn-trucking.JPG)
> _Switchboard is right for Centurion because it is truly built to what my fleet, dispatch, and safety divisions need. It’s simple to use, and also has all the features required for proper compliance and fleet management._
_Daman_
 _Centurion Trucking Inc._
![Richmond transport Ltd. logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/645e697f184e4a0dd9e60099/6462b5c671184d2966a6f32e_Richmond-Transport-Ltd.jpg)
> _Switchboard is very user friendly, easy to learn and adapt to technology. We have been working with Switchboard for a long time. You guys go the extra mile to keep us happy. Customer service responds quickly and issues are sorted faster. Best investment we ever made, prices are fair. Thank you!_
_Sukh Kamboj_
 _Richmond Transport Ltd._

generated_description:
### Switchboard: The Backbone of Trucking Tech

**Company Overview**
Founded in 2015 and proudly established in Vancouver, Canada, Switchboard operates at the intersection of technology and transportation. The company's mission is succinct but powerful: *Technology for Trucking*. This aligns perfectly with their role as a provider of advanced solutions that optimize freight movement across North America.

As part of Y Combinator's Batch W19, Switchboard has carved a niche in the logistics sector with a focused team of 24 employees. With Nan as their Group Partner, they are categorized under tags like *autonomous trucking*, *SaaS*, *B2B*, and *logistics*.

**What They Do**
Switchboard's offerings revolve around enhancing visibility and efficiency in freight operations. Through real-time data from devices installed on commercial vehicles, they empower fleets to track freight locations, manage routing, and streamline compliance. Their range of solutions includes:

- **ELD & Hours of Service**
- **IFTA Report Automation**
- **Asset Tracking**
- **Weigh Station Bypass**
- **Fleet Management**
- **Document Scan & Send**
- **Vision Dashcam**

You can explore these features on their website: [Switchboard](https://www.onswitchboard.com).

**Customer-Centric Approach**
Prioritizing ease of use, Switchboard aims to simplify compliance with the Department of Transportation and the National Safety Code. Their platform promises to get fleets compliant in moments rather than weeks, offering 24/7 support in multiple languages. 

Customers rave about their experiences, highlighting not just the functionality but also Switchboard's commitment to customer service. For instance, Jack Bal from Rai Express Lines Ltd. mentions, "Great customer service by Accounts department plus support team," showcasing the company's dedication to swift assistance.

**Innovation in Fleet Management**
Switchboard's technology ushers in real-time analytics on driver safety behaviors, GPS tracking, and geofencing notifications, allowing fleet managers to focus their strategies where they matter most. Their tools are designed to save time and money, supporting everything from asset tracking to integrated dashcam features.

**Conclusion**
In the crowded field of logistics tech, Switchboard stands out as a reliable partner for fleets looking to enhance their operations. They've proven that with cutting-edge technology and a user-friendly approach, compliance and efficiency can go hand in hand. If you're in the trucking industry and looking for a partner to streamline your operations, Switchboard looks to be a compelling option. 

For a closer look, you can [book a demo](https://www.onswitchboard.com/</sign-up>) or dive into their offerings directly at [onswitchboard.com](https://www.onswitchboard.com).
